title: Incorrect Behavior in Servlet 3.0 Chapter 7.1.1 Regarding Custom Cookie Name and URL Rewriting
description: The bug report indicates a discrepancy in Servlet 3.0 Chapter 7.1.1 regarding the impact of a custom cookie name on URL rewriting.
OB: Contrary to the documentation, the custom cookie name does not affect URL rewriting as stated. Instead, the default 'jsessionid' is used, which contradicts the expected behavior.
EB: The expected behavior is for the custom cookie name to influence URL rewriting, as documented in Servlet 3.0 Chapter 7.1.1.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Deploy the attached 'cookiename.war' file. 2. Access http://localhost:8080/cookiename/
